summary: A disfigured Holocaust survivor sets out to determine if the man she loved betrayed her trust.
cast: Nina Hoss|Ronald Zehrfeld|Nina Kunzendorf|Trystan Pütter|Michael Maertens|Imogen Kogge|Felix Römer|Uwe Preuss|Valerie Koch|Eva Bay|Jeff Burrell|Nikola Kastner|Max Hopp|Megan Gay|Kirsten Block|Frank Seppeler|Daniela Holtz|Kathrin Wehlisch|Michael Wenninger|Claudia Geisler-Bading|Sofia Exss
title: Phoenix
